column6:
Lactino, as the MGM Lion appears in a an iris. On a blue background, we
can see Lactino and Lactel logos and also the productʼs benefits (Vitamin D, Calcium and
protein) on the same frame.  Lactino says: "Lactino !!!"

Kids are about to finish the work… Suddenly Lactino appears.
Lactino (to the kids):
« Are you done?! »

Lactino is juming as a cartoon character around them, trying to encourage them.
But when it appears obvious that they canʼt succeed, he comes to foreground at full speed,
having a totally and hilarious disappointed expression.

Lactino appears behind the kids, slowing down with a tire sound effect like in the
cartoons…
Immediatly, the kids twist towards him.
Lactino :
« If you wanna … »

Lactino :
« … grow big here… »
In the same time he's moving the finger of his two hands around his head… Suddenly, his
head is getting bigger.
In the foreground, the kids are impressed.
Lactino :
« and here… »
He raises his two arms. Muscle are growing like bubbles Under the fur. Kids are impressed
one more time.

Lactinoʼs back, blurred in the foreground.
Lactino :
«Therefore, you need …»

Lactino comes full speed followed by the kids and moves the tool box (animated with nylon
wires). Mom puts the tray on the table.

Mom and Lactino twist to each other
making a big smile.
The words CALCIUM, VITAMIN D and PROTEIN are coming on the screen.

« + » and « = » are added in post between the packs. 
The word « CALCIUM » as well.

Track in on Lactino. At the beginning of the shot, heʼs still standing on the side of the mom. At the end, heʼs shot in close up.
With a very smart smile, heʼs looking at the children.
Lactino : « So, any idea ?! »
He twists to his right (to mom).
Lactino and the mom so happy the kids found the solution, they clap their hand in a « take five » action.

Shot in two passes :
- the tree and the bird
- the tree and the kids
We mix the two passes in post.
Two packs on a white limbo. An iris is opened just above, with Lactino making a wink (as he says : « stay tuned for my next épisode !
